subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez has a 56.0 percent pass completion rate everywhere but in the red zone, where he drops to 47.8 percent — a weakness the Jets hope to improve in 2011.
snippet: The Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez has a 56.0 percent pass completion rate everywhere but in the red zone, where he drops to 47.8 percent — a weakness the Jets hope to improve in 2011.
